text: our company is really a Growth Company
in the travel industry we've got over
750 Travel Centers a huge tanker Fleet
across the United States that dumps fuel
every 20 seconds the process that's
required to pick it up drop it off all
the logistics in between is highly
complicated multiple applications that
really have to work really well together
we've been around for 60 years we needed
to do a modernization journey around
that technology stack one of the key
things for us is making sure that our
platforms are scalable and able to
really meet our future needs not just
where we are today but where we're going
AWS was our key partner in helping
transform those applications moving them
onto your infrastructure and today we
feel like we have a true scalable
solution that meets our needs and we can
feel really consistent about its
delivery having someone that I know is
willing to work with us and figure out
where we are today and how do we meet a
business problem not just a technology
problem is really important to me and to
our entire team
[Music]
